document_data.caption: One of the true legal eagles.
document_data.name: Jarnathan
document_data.mainbody:
'''Jarnathan''' was an [[aarakocra]] and one of the ten members that served on the [[Absolution Council]], the ruling body of the [[Revel's End]] prison and the group that oversaw the fates of the prison's inmates on behalf of the [[Lords' Alliance]], during the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].{{Cite video/Honor Among Thieves}}<ref group="note">It is unknown which settlement Jarnathan represents. Available options are [[Amphail (village)|Amphail]], [[Longsaddle]], [[Mirabar]], [[Mithral Hall]], [[Silverymoon]], [[Waterdeep]], and [[Yartar]].
{{quote|Pardon my belatedness.|Jarnathan}}
document_data.Personality: As an aarakocra, he was thought to be the councilor most likely to support pardoning and releasing prisoners. He had a distinguished air.
document_data.Description: He had brown feathers and wore red [[robe]]s.<ref>
document_data.History:
[[File:Heroes Unite - Absolution Council.jpg|thumb|right|250px|''Jarnathan has his feathers ruffled.'']]
In the late 1490s [[DR]],{{HAT-time}} the Absolution Council—Jarnathan, [[Kriv Norixius]], [[Voss Anderton]], and [[Jil Torbo]]—were to meet in Revel's End to consider a pardon for [[Edgin Darvis]] and [[Holga Kilgore]] for the crimes of skulduggery and grand larceny. However, a storm delayed Jarnathan's journey so the council started without him, but Edgin kept inquiring about Jarnathan's absence, when he'd arrive, and how unfortunate it was that he'd miss out on his story. forcing him to fly them to ice below. Jarnathan was knocked out by the hard landing, but survived.

More than a year later, the same council met to consider [[Forge Fitzwilliam]] for pardon, but were wise to the same tricks and refused him. Forge also grabbed Jarnathan and tried to jump through the window, only to find it bricked up behind a curtain, stunning both himself and the poor aarakocra.
